Test Name: High Risk HPV DNA Detection with Genotyping
Specimen Type: Cervical swab (also accepts vaginal, anal, and oropharyngeal swabs)
Purpose: To detect and genotype high-risk Human Papillomavirus (HPV) DNA for diagnosis, management, and follow-up of patients at risk for cervical and other HPV-associated cancers.
Equipment: Certified molecular HPV DNA genotyping kit, DNA extraction kit/system, real-time PCR thermocycler
